summary: The overhaul of carpentry,staves and skill of archery
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3]Makes Bows craftable only at Bow Modeling Station,which is located only in Drunken Huntsman,Imperial Fletcher and Fort Dawnguard.[/size]
[size=3]There are three components at those locations,that serve the Skill Of Archery.[/size][size=3]In addition to mentioned Bow Modeling Station
where you can craft Bows,Advanced Bows,Crossbows and Scoped Bows,[/size][size=3]there is Arrow Lab where you can craft poison arrows;[/size][size=3]and there is Wood Eng. Station,where you can craft Arrows,Bolts and base bow.
[/size][size=3]All bows are now craftable,and are renamed accordingly.
To craft bows you need Advanced Smithing perk.The bows have increased range and are customized in sense of damage and speed.[/size]
[size=3]Every bow recipe has base bow,which ingame you know as long bow.[/size]
[size=3]Further on,one of these bows is a part of recipe for more complexed bows. ([/size][size=3]Check the pcs. to see example of recipes)[/size]

[size=3]To craft arrows and crossbows you need aproprriate perks which are in Archery skill tree.[/size]
[size=3]There are 13 type of Arrows to be crafted at Wood Eng. Station: [/size]
[color=#cccccc][size=3][i]1. Valenwood Wood Arrows - Elven Arrows
2. Corrundum Tip Arrows - Orcish Arrows
3. Ebony Bullets - Ebony Arrows
4. Hamerfell Noble Arrows (New)
5. Dwarven Bronze Arrows - Dwarven Arrows
6. Glass Tip Arrows - Glass Arrows
7. Common Imperial Arrows - Steel Arrows
8. Amethyst Arrows - Stalhrim Arrows
9. Boned Arrows - Dragonbone Arrows
10. Assault Arrows - Nordic Arrows
11. Elite Orca Arrows (acces with Marksman perk))
12. Arrows On Fire
[i]12. Akaviri Arrows[/i]
[/i][/size][/color]
[size=3]And 11 poison arrows on Arrow Lab. to be crafted,with mine enormous gratitude to [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61490]Elianora[/url][size=3] for that :[/size]
[i][color=#d8d8d8][size=3]1. Necromancy Made Arrows - Daedric Arrows[/size]
[size=3]2. Arrow Of Fear[/size]
[size=3]3. Arrow Of Frenzy[/size]
[size=3]4. Arrow Of Frostbite[/size]
[size=3]5. Arrow Of Paralysis[/size]
[size=3]6. Hunter Poison Arrow[/size]
[size=3]7. Poison Spider Arrow[/size]
[size=3]8. Stinger Arrow
9. Dragon Hunter Arrows ( acces with Marksman perk)
[/size][/color][/i][color=#d8d8d8][size=3][i]10. Silver Arrows (access with Marksman perk)
[i]11. Explosive Arrows (access with Marksman perk)[/i][/i][/size][/color]

[size=3]Thx to a [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/]Outlaw666[/url][size=3] this mod also gives you an option to craft an scoped version of most bows.[/size]
[size=3]To craft scoped version thou you need an Modeler perk from smithing skill tree and recipe ingr. : desired bow,glass 2x,dwemer cog[/size][/font]

[size=3][font=Georgia]All bows are craftable,the unique bows from game with all official Dlc's,are craftable but renamed,and also there are 44 bows to craft.
All that thx to our authors which are mentioned in credits below.[/font]

[b]There is also [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870]Insanity's Huntsman[/url] which you must buy at Angi's Camp. [/b][/size][b]
[/b][i][size=3][b](Comes with all ext. packs which you can buy at Huntsman and Imperial Fletcher)[/b][/size]
[/i]
[size=4][i]The following bows are available : [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]1.[/color] Obisidian Bow - [i]Auriel's Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]2. [/color]Ivory Boned Bow - [i]Dragonbone Bow[/i] [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]3. [/color]Dwarven Zephyr Bow - [i]Katriah Dawnguard Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]4.[/color] Dwarven Black Bow - [i]Kagrumez reward bow[/i]  [i]Unenchanted[/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]5.[/color] Assault Bow Light - [i]Nordic Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]6.[/color] Amethyst Bow - [i]Stalhrim Bow  [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]7.[/color] Assault Bow Dark - [i]Draugr Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]8. [/color]Dwarven Replica Bow - [i]Dwarven Bow[/i] [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]9.[/color] Ebony Wood Bow - [i]Ebony Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]10.[/color] Aldmeri Composite Bow - [i]Elven Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]11. [/color]Bosmeric Composite Bow - [i]Forsworn Bow[/i] [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]12. [/color]Glass Light Bow - [i]Glass Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]13. [/color]Corrundum Bow - [i]Orcish Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]14.[/color] Imperial Composite Bow - [i]Imperial Bow [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]15.[/color] Daedric Bow - [i]Daedric Bow[/i] 
[color=#000000]16 .[/color]Ebony Crimson Bow - [i]Nightingale Bow[/i]  @ scoped known as Shadowmark Sniper    
[/size][size=4][i]with new unique bows. : [/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]17. [/color]Arcane Bow  [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]18.[/color] Daedric Light Bow [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]19.[/color] Glass Bow [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]20. [/color]Imperial Assault Bow [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]21.[/color] Dwarven Original Bow (Also Scoped Vers.)[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]22.[/color] Dwarven Chromed Bow [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]23.[/color] Hamerfell Bow [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]24.[/color] Ranger Bow (Also Scoped Ver.)[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]25.[/color] Ebony Elite Bow  ( Scoped Vers. @ Ebony Elven Deviation )[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]26.[/color] Glass Heavy Bow
[color=#000000]27. [/color]Elven Royal Bow
[color=#000000]28. [/color]Valenwood Oak Bow
[/size][size=3][color=#000000]29.  [/color]Orca Elite Bow
[/size][size=3][color=#000000]30.  [/color]Ebony Trimmed Bow
[/size][size=3][color=#000000]31.  [/color]Dwarven Silvered Bow
[color=#000000]32.  [/color]Silver Engraved Bow I
[color=#000000]33.  [/color]Silver Engraved Bow II
[color=#000000]34.  [/color]Bosmeric Common Bow
[color=#000000]35.  [/color]Colovian Bow
[color=#000000]36.  [/color]Common Bow
[color=#000000]37.  [/color]Customised Bow
[color=#000000]38.  [/color]Customised Bow Var. 2
[color=#000000]39.  [/color]Ivory Bleached Bow
[color=#000000]40.  [/color]Steel Bow
[color=#000000]41. [/color] Dwarven Prototype
[color=#000000]42.[/color]  Akaviri Bow Var.1
[color=#000000]43. [/color] Akaviri Bow Var.2[/size]
[size=3]+[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870] Huntsman[/url],7 types of Hunting Bow,Bow of Shadow and Ebony All. Bow which are all unique textures.[/size]

[font=Georgia][size=3]Some bows can be upgraded further than scoped (after you model them with scope) you can craft them into bows which shoot faster,
and have unique charachteristic.These are called the Advanced Bows and are available with Aegis perk :[/size][/font]

[i]1. [/i][size=3][u]Webspinner[/u] [/size][i](Fires three times as fast as standard bow )[/i]
[i]2. [/i][size=3][u]Obisidan[/u][/size][u][i] [/i][size=3]Arch[/size] [/u][i](Fires Twice as fast and causes as much damage)[/i]
[i]3. [/i][size=3][u]Ebony Alloys Sniper[/u][/size] [i](Fires Twice as fast as standard bow and has chance of instant kill)[/i]
[i]4. [/i][size=3][u]Boa[/u][/size][i]( Shots are very powerfull and more effective against human actors)[/i]
[i]5. [/i][u][size=3]Bow Of Secunda[/size][/u] [i](shoots twice as fast as standard bow)[/i]
[i]6. [/i][size=3][u]Emperor Hunting Bow[/u][/size][i] (scoped and effective against animals)
7. [/i][size=3][u]Bow Of The Shadow[/u][/size] [i](Silence Effect on arrows )[/i]

[size=4]
[b]Changes the Smithing skill tree,in manor that it is addapted to Archery crafting.
The smithing is now called Engineer and it consists of following perks :[/b]
[size=3][color=#000000]1. [/color][b]Steel Smithing[/b] - [/size][size=3]craft steel,scaled and imperial armor and weapons.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]2.[/color] [b]Advanced Smithing[/b] - [/size][size=3]craft dragonbone,dragon,orcish armor and weapons.Improved tempering health generaly.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]3.[/color] [b]Elven Smithing[/b] [/size][size=3]-craft ebony,elven,stalhrim armor and weapons.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]4. [/color][b]Dwarven Philosophies[/b] - [/size][size=3]craft dwarven and glass armor and weapons.Improved tempering health generaly.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]5. [/color][b]Automatics [/b]-[/size][size=3]craft Daedric armor and weapons[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]6.[/color] [b]Professional[/b] [/size][size=3]- temper to level legendary[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]7.[/color] [b]Wax Techniques[/b] [i](three levels) [b] [/b][/i]- [/size][size=3]temper bows [/size][size=3] [/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]8.[/color][b] Modeler[/b] [/size][size=3]-craft scoped bows   [b]             [/b]
[color=#000000]9[/color][/size][size=3][color=#000000].[/color][b] Torpedo Logic [/b]- craft crossbows and bolts
[/size][size=3][i]                [/i][/size]
[b]Adds new perks to Archery perk tree :[/b][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]1. [/color][b]Expert Assassin[/b] - recover all arows,chance to disarm opponent with arrows.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]2.[/color] [b]Precision[/b] - boosts your marksman skill extra one legendery park (100 pts)[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]3.[/color] [b]Marksman[/b] - arrows stagger more 
                        - and craft Silence and Stagger bolts;craft also Silver,Dragon Hunter,Elite Orca Hunter arrows and Arrows on flame.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]4. [/color][b]Solar Bolts[/b] - critical shot with crossbows has 30% chance and does 70% more damage.[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]5.[/color] [b]Lunar Hunter[/b]  [/size][size=3]- arrows ignore 30% of armor                 
[color=#000000] 6[/color][/size][size=3][color=#000000].[/color] [b]Aegis [/b]- Recieve aegis ability and open 7 advanced bows crafting recipes.
[/size][size=3][i]                -Aegis Ability[/i] - equiped with bow you do not stagger.
[/size][size=3]
[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Angi at Angi's Camp sells some archery spellbooks,as well as the unique and upgradable bow Huntsman.
She also sells unique circlet Crown of Archeror and four unique rings.
[/b][/size]
[size=4][b][u]Angi's Spellbooks : [/u][/b][/size][/font]
[size=3][color=#000000]1. Alteration [/color]Hardened Core [i](increased damage with crossbow and armor rating while equipped with crossbow)[/i]
[color=#000000]2. Alteration[i] [/i][/color]Infernal Fury[i] (speeds up attack with bows two times for 20 sec.)[/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]3. Destruction [/color]Fatal Bullet [i](attack with bow increased by 150% for 10sec.)[/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]4. Restoration [/color]Night Vision[/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]5. Illusion [/color]Chameleon [i](of 50%)[/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]6. Restoration [/color]Fire Stalker [i](fire resistance of 100% for 30 sec)[/i][/size]
[size=3][color=#000000]7. Destruction[/color] Ice Bow Enchant[i](enchant currently equipped bow with ice enchant)[/i][/size]
[color=#000000]8. Conjiration [/color]Bound Arcane Bow 
[color=#000000]9. Conjuration [/color]Bound Infernal Bow 
[color=#000000]10. Conjuration [/color]Bound Crossbow[size=3]
[/size][color=#000000]11. Conjuratiin [/color][size=3]Summon Dremora Markynaz[/size][i] (dremora archer)
[/i]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4][u]Angi's Jewelry : [/u][/size][/b]
[b]-Crown Of Archeror -[/b]chameleon 70%
[b]-Ring Of Ambusher [color=#980000]-[/color][/b][b][color=#980000] [/color][/b]sneak fortified by 25pts,Lockpick by 50 pts,slow down time constant.
- [b]Ring Of Stalker-[/b][b] [/b]resist disease 50% and move faster by 150%
- [b]Ring Of Predator - [/b] poison resist 100% and water breathing 
- [b]Ring Of Sweeper [size=3]-[/size][/b][size=2][b]detect Life,chameleon 15%
[/b][/size]
[b][size=4]And [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870]Hunstman. [/url]﻿[/size][/b][/font]



[font=Georgia][size=3]At the Imp.Fletcher and D.Hunstman,now you can buy parts for Huntsman,and prevoius merchandise.[/size][/font]

[font=Georgia]The Poisoner Arrows thx to [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61490]Elianora[/url][font=Georgia]﻿ are also available in this mod.To craft them you need Poisoner perk from alchemist skill.[/font]
[font=Georgia]You can craft them at Arrow Lab,which you can find thou only at Drunken Huntsman.The idea was that you replace that WorkStation[/font]
[font=Georgia]with some mod which can move statics or manualy through CK,since I wanted Arrow-Poisoning to be more intimate experience.[/font]

[i]The Crossbows are craftable also at Bow Modeling Station.T[/i][i]he following crossbows are available :[/i]
[i]- Imperial Common Crossbow
- Imperial Fine Crossbow [/i]
[i]- Dwarven Crossbow
- Dwarven Enhanced Crossbow
- Dwarven Fine Crossbow
- Semi Automatic Crossbow[/i]

[i]The following bolts are available :[/i]
[i]1. Iron Bolts - Shock,Fire and Ice Option[/i]
[i]2. Bronze Bolts - Shock,Fire and Ice Option[/i]
[i]3. Steel Bolts - Silence Option and Stagger Option

[/i][font=Georgia]At wood eng. station you can also craft staves which are  available thx to [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22691]Kearsage[/url][font=Georgia].[/font]
[font=Georgia]Among vanilla staves there are also following staves,which after you craft,you should use at Staff Crafting Table to craft into magic staff.Every of added staves has two variants of magic staff in Staff Crafting Table.
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][i][color=#000000]1. [/color][/i]Unenchanted Winterhold Scholar Staff [/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Frost Battle Staff - [i]Frost Damage Of 25 pts per sec,[/i]
Battle Staff Of Toxicity -[i] Drain Stamina 20 pts from target[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][i][color=#000000]2.[/color] [/i]Unenchanted Ebony Staff[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Ebony Staff Of Banish -[i] Banish daedra into oblivion[/i]
Ebony Staff Of Summon - [i]Summon Storm Atronach[/i][/size][i]
[/i][/font]
[font=Georgia][u][b][i][color=#000000]3.[/color][/i] Unechanted Ebony Rose Staff [/b][/u][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Ebony Rose Of Absorb - [i]Absorb health 7 pts per sec.[/i]
Ebony Rose Of Numbness - [i]Stagger the opponent for 4 sec.[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][color=#000000][i]4.[/i] [/color]Unechanted Ebony Klasik Staff[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Ebony Staff Of Silence -[i] Silence for 20 sec on target[/i]
Ebony Staff Of Summon - [i]Summon Two Storm Attronach[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][u][b][i][color=#000000]5.[/color][/i] Unenchanted Ivory Polish Staff[/b][/u][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Ivory Sphere Staff Of Repulsion - [i]Repel lesser undead[/i]
Ivory Sphere STaff Of Expulsion [i]- Expel daedra[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][i][color=#000000]6.[/color][/i] Unenchanted Classical Magic Staff[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Staff Of Healer - [i]Heal Other[/i]
Staff Of Adjutant -[i] Rally[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][u][b][i][color=#000000]7. [/color][/i]Unenchanted Battlemage Staff[/b][/u][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Staff Of Attack - [i]Flames 25 pts of damage per sec.[/i]
Staff Of Summon - [i]Summon Two Frost Attronach[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][color=#000000]8. [/color]Unenchanted Cobra Branch[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Cobra,Deffensive - [i]Ward of 60 pts per sec.[/i]
Cobra Offensive - [i]Electricity of 25 pts damage per sec.[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][color=#000000]9. [/color]Unenchanted Daedric Umbra Staff[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Daedric Staff Of Charm - [i]Charm Nearby people[/i]
Daedric Staff Of Summon - [i]Summon Daedroth[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][color=#000000]10. [/color]Unechanted Valenwood Oak Staff[/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Elven Staff Of Deffense - [i]Nearby allies immune to magic 100 % for 15 sec.[/i]
Elven Staff Of Silence - [i]Silence of 7 sec. on target[/i][/size]
[/font]
[font=Georgia][b][u][color=#000000]11. [/color][b][u]Glass [/u][/b]Cylindar [/u][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=2]Cylindar,Stamina Drainer [i]- Drain Stamina 25 pts. per sec on target[/i]
Cylindar,Anasthetiser -[i] Paralyse for 15 sec. target.[/i][/size][/font]



[font=Georgia]Thx to [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78347]BouBoule[/url][font=Georgia],there are 9 spears available. at wood eng. station :
[/font]
[i][size=3][color=#000000]1. [/color]Spear,Akaviri
[color=#000000]2.[/color] Spear,Arcane
[color=#000000]3.[/color] Spear,Dwarven
[color=#000000]4. [/color]Spear,Elven
[color=#000000]5.[/color] Spear,Common
[color=#000000]6.[/color] Spear,Orca
[color=#000000]7. [/color]Spear,Imperial
[color=#000000]8. [/color]Spear,Glass
[color=#000000]9. [/color]Spear Ebony[/size][/i]



[font=Georgia]P.S Also the Falmer Bow is renamed to Hagraven Bow but is not craftable,as the Iron,Falmer and Draugr Arrows [/font]
[font=Georgia]which are called Used Arrows.Hope you do not mind an little furniture overhaul I did at Fort Dawnguard.[/font]
[size=3]The Auriel bow has unique Black&Gold textures,which are available thx to [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31791]Kashif101[/url][size=3],and thus by is still unique weapon,while[/size]
[font=Georgia][size=3]Obisidian bow has vanilla Auriel Bow textures.[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#980000][size=4][b][i]Have fun  :)[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=4][b][u][i]Crediteria : [/i][/u][/b][/size][/font]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61037]Crystelli[/url]﻿ for New Zephyr Textures

[b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361]Lautestanni[/url] for Aela's rings
[b][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27433]Xooki3[/url] for Ebony Trimmed Bow

[b][b][b][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/341894]AlexScorpion[/url] for Emperor Silvered Bow
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13317/]Howlego08[/url] for Valenwood Oak Bow
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23244]Atomek[/url] for Orca Elite Bow
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45540]Strotti[/url] for Carpenter Workbench
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10258480]Lor[/url] for Furniture 
Lilith for Furniture
LoliceptResource for Clutter
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/]184Gesu[/url] for Some Bows and Flaming Arrows
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?tab=files]DecimusMaximus[/url] for Real Bows
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70873?tab=files]Justice123[/url] for Semi Automatic Crossbow
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12705?tab=description]SilverFeetStudio[/url] for Fire Arrows
[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12705?tab=description]Jet4571[/url] for Dwarven Prototype Bow
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704/]0Prime0[/url] for Akaviri Items
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31791]Kashif101[/url]﻿ for Auriel Bow  textures


[/b][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][i]Special Request :
I was thinking on adding also the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61431?tab=posts]Jaxnoz Archery Util[/url]﻿ in the new version,but unfortanetaly I am not good at codes and scripts,
so if there is somebody with good will that is interested in adding to the mentioned mod options of disabled crosshair as well as dot croshair,and fixing compatibility issues too,then please conntact me via PM.[/i][/size][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
